title: Stealth Ultra 2nd GEN | Parkour & Freerunning, Ninja Warrior & Movement Training Shoe | World’s #1 Parkour Shoe.
features: DESIGNED TO BE THE BEST PARKOUR & FREERUNNING SHOE IN THE WORLD – The Stealth Ultra 2nd GENs were designed and developed by elite Parkour and Ninja Warrior athletes and for elite Parkour and Ninja Warrior athletes! It performs for them, and it will perform for you and help you take your training to the next level.

WORN BY TRACEURS WORLDWIDE – Professional athletes around the world wear the Stealth Ultra “X” 2nd Gens! They are actively worn by Traceurs in USA, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, Australia, England, France, Germany, Finland, Norway, Austria, Sweden, Russia and more!

MOST COMFORTABLE TRAINING SHOE EVER – Comfort is #1, and with our “Compression Landing System” dual sock liner design, this shoe is constructed so that every stride and jump you take feels amazing. From the first time you try these on we think you’ll agree, this is one of the most comfortable shoes you have ever worn.

AMAZING GRIP & TRACTION – We designed these shoes with a hyper focus on our tread pattern and our sole rubber compound. After all, in Parkour and Ninja, grip is paramount! From the first time you put these shoes on you will feel the incredible traction they give, and you will feel totally in control during your training.

BETTER THAN MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - The quality of our shoes are second to none, and we stand by that 100%! Use these shoes for 6 months and if you don't believe you got every penny's worth, we will give you a full refund, no questions asked.
description: After 10 years in the making and almost 4 years specifically spent on this design, we humbly launch our new Stealth Ultra 2nd GEN Shoe, designed to be the best Parkour & Freerunning shoe on the planet. With incredible cushioning, superb traction, flawless heal-to-toe transitioning, and one of the most comfortable all-around designs you’ve ever felt, we think you will love this shoe from the first time you put it on. Made for Parkour, Freerunning, Ninja Warrior, and movement training, and perfect for beginners and advanced practitioners alike, we think you will love this shoe. To prove it, we back it with our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Give it a try, and if you don’t absolutely love it, we’ll give you a full refund, no questions asked. Try the Stealth Ultra 2nd GENs today and get ready to Take Flight.

title: The Stealth Ultra 2nd GENs in Action.
